Name: TA 1291 Global filters edit page UI tests

Tests.Name: Test 1: Create a global filter from the list page

Steps.Name: Step: Create a global filter 'gf'
Step: Create a global filter 'gf1'
Step: User can delete global filter 'gf1'
Step: Create a global filter 'gf-source1'
Step: Update source of the global filter 'gf_source1'
Step: update IP`s of global filter 'gf_source1'
Step: User can delete global filter 'gf-source1'
Step: Create a global filter 'gf2'
Step: User can add entries to the section global filter 'gf2'

Step: Create a global filter 'gf_source2'
Step: Update source of the global filter 'gf_source2'
Step: User can add entries to the section of the global filter 'gf_source2'
Step: User cannot delete entries from global filter 'gf_source2'

Tests.Name: Test 4: Global filter`s name field validations
